Package civitas.celestis.graphics.model

Class ObjModel

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.graphics.model.ObjModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Model
public class ObjModel extends Object implements Model

ObjModel

Implementation of the Model interface based on a Wavefront .obj file.
